5 pythonå¯¼å…¥æœ¬åœ°ä»“åº“åŒ…åˆ°Nexus

1.æ¸…é™¤ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥å¤±æ•ˆçš„jaråŒ…

SOURCE_DIRæ”¹æˆè‡ªå·±ç›®å½•

import os
import concurrent.futures
try:
    from tqdm import tqdm
except ImportError:
    print("âŒ è¯·å…ˆå®‰è£…è¿›åº¦æ¡åº“: pip install tqdm")
    exit(1)

# ================= é…ç½®åŒºåŸŸ =================
SOURCE_DIR = r"D:\work\MavenRepository\mavenRepository-old"
MAX_JAR_SIZE = 1024  # 1KB
BAD_POM_KEYWORDS = ["<!DOCTYPE html>", "<title>Harbor</title>", "Login to Harbor"]

# æ ¹æ®ä½ çš„ 12600KF (16çº¿ç¨‹)ï¼ŒIOå¯†é›†å‹ä»»åŠ¡æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®å¾—ç¨å¾®æ¿€è¿›ä¸€ç‚¹
# è®¾ä¸º CPUæ ¸å¿ƒæ•° * 4ï¼Œä¿è¯ç£ç›˜ IO è·‘æ»¡
WORKER_COUNT = os.cpu_count() * 4 
# ===========================================

def check_files_in_directory(root, files):
    """
    å·¥ä½œçº¿ç¨‹ä»»åŠ¡ï¼šæ£€æŸ¥å•ä¸ªç›®å½•ä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
    è¿”å›ï¼šè¯¥ç›®å½•ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰ååŒ…çš„ (root, base_name) åˆ—è¡¨
    """
    bad_items = []
    
    for file in files:
        file_path = os.path.join(root, file)
        is_bad = False
        
        # 1. åˆ¤å®š Jar æ˜¯å¦æŸå (åˆ©ç”¨çŸ­è·¯é€»è¾‘ï¼Œå…ˆåˆ¤æ–­åç¼€)
        if file.endswith(".jar"):
            try:
                if os.path.getsize(file_path) < MAX_JAR_SIZE:
                    is_bad = True
            except: pass
        
        # 2. åˆ¤å®š POM æ˜¯å¦æŸå
        elif file.endswith(".pom"):
            try:
                with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8', errors='ignore') as f:
                    # åªè¯»å¤´ 1KB
                    content = f.read(1024)
                    for keyword in BAD_POM_KEYWORDS:
                        if keyword in content:
                            is_bad = True
                            break
            except: pass
            
        if is_bad:
            base_name = file
            if base_name.endswith(".jar"): base_name = base_name[:-4]
            if base_name.endswith(".pom"): base_name = base_name[:-4]
            bad_items.append((root, base_name))
            
    return bad_items

def delete_task(args):
    """
    åˆ é™¤ä»»åŠ¡çš„çº¿ç¨‹å‡½æ•°
    """
    folder, base_name, metadata_files = args
    deleted = 0
    if not os.path.exists(folder):
        return 0

    try:
        files = os.listdir(folder)
    except:
        return 0

    for file in files:
        file_path = os.path.join(folder, file)
        should_delete = False
        
        if file.startswith(base_name):
            should_delete = True
        elif file in metadata_files:
            should_delete = True
            
        if should_delete:
            try:
                os.remove(file_path)
                deleted += 1
            except: pass
    return deleted

def main():
    if not os.path.exists(SOURCE_DIR):
        print(f"âŒ ç›®å½•ä¸å­˜åœ¨: {SOURCE_DIR}")
        return

    print(f"ğŸš€ [i5-12600KF] å…¨åŠ›æ¨¡å¼å¯åŠ¨")
    print(f"ğŸ”¥ å¯ç”¨çº¿ç¨‹æ•°: {WORKER_COUNT}")
    print(f"ğŸ“‚ æ‰«æç›®æ ‡: {SOURCE_DIR}")

    directories_to_clean = set()
    total_files_scanned = 0
    
    # ------------------ æ‰«æé˜¶æ®µ ------------------
    # ä½¿ç”¨ ThreadPoolExecutor
    with concurrent.futures.ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=WORKER_COUNT) as executor:
        futures = []
        
        print("â³ æ­£åœ¨éå†ç›®å½•ç»“æ„å¹¶åˆ†å‘ä»»åŠ¡...")
        
        # ç”Ÿäº§è€…ï¼šä¸»çº¿ç¨‹å¿«é€Ÿéå†ç›®å½•
        for root, dirs, files in os.walk(SOURCE_DIR):
            # å‰ªæä¼˜åŒ–
            dirs[:] = [d for d in dirs if not d.startswith('.')]
            
            if not files:
                continue
                
            # æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ï¼šå°†â€œå¤„ç†ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å†…çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶â€ä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡æäº¤
            # è¿™æ ·æ¯”â€œæ¯ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡â€æ•ˆç‡é«˜å¾—å¤š
            future = executor.submit(check_files_in_directory, root, files)
            futures.append(future)

        # ç­‰å¾…ç»“æœå¹¶æ˜¾ç¤ºè¿›åº¦æ¡
        print(f"âœ… ç›®å½•éå†å®Œæˆï¼Œå…±ç”Ÿæˆ {len(futures)} ä¸ªæ‰¹å¤„ç†ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œå¼€å§‹å¹¶è¡Œæ‰«æ...")
        
        with tqdm(total=len(futures), unit="dir", desc="å¹¶è¡Œæ‰«æä¸­") as pbar:
            for future in concurrent.futures.as_completed(futures):
                try:
                    bad_results = future.result()
                    if bad_results:
                        for item in bad_results:
                            directories_to_clean.add(item)
                except Exception as e:
                    pass
                pbar.update(1)

    # ------------------ ç»“æœå±•ç¤º ------------------
    if not directories_to_clean:
        print("\nâœ… æ­å–œï¼æ²¡æœ‰å‘ç°æŸåæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚")
        return

    print(f"\nâš ï¸ å‘ç° {len(directories_to_clean)} ç»„æŸåçš„æ„ä»¶ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚")
    print("ç¤ºä¾‹å‰3é¡¹:")
    for i, (folder, name) in enumerate(list(directories_to_clean)[:3]):
        print(f" - {os.path.join(folder, name)}")

    confirm = input("\nğŸ”´ ç¡®è®¤åˆ é™¤ï¼Ÿ(y/n): ")
    if confirm.lower() != 'y': return

    # ------------------ åˆ é™¤é˜¶æ®µ (åŒæ ·å¤šçº¿ç¨‹) ------------------
    print("\nğŸ§¹ å¯åŠ¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹æ¸…ç†...")
    metadata_files = ["_remote.repositories", "_maven.repositories", "resolver-status.properties"]
    
    total_deleted = 0
    
    # åˆ é™¤é€šå¸¸å¾ˆå¿«ï¼Œä½†ä¹Ÿå¯èƒ½å› ä¸ºç£ç›˜IOå¡é¡¿ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¹Ÿå¹¶è¡ŒåŒ–
    delete_tasks = [(folder, base_name, metadata_files) for folder, base_name in directories_to_clean]
    
    with concurrent.futures.ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=WORKER_COUNT) as executor:
        # map ä¼šæŒ‰é¡ºåºè¿”å›ç»“æœï¼Œé€‚åˆè¿›åº¦æ¡
        results = list(tqdm(executor.map(delete_task, delete_tasks), total=len(delete_tasks), desc="å¹¶è¡Œåˆ é™¤ä¸­"))
        total_deleted = sum(results)

    print(f"\nâœ¨ å¤§åŠŸå‘Šæˆï¼åˆ©ç”¨å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å…±åˆ é™¤äº† {total_deleted} ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

2. é€šè¿‡httpæ–¹å¼ä¸Šä¼ åˆ°nexus

REPO_URL ï¼šnexuséƒ¨ç½²è·¯å¾„+ä»“åº“åç§°

USERNAME ï¼šnexusç”¨æˆ·å

PASSWORD ï¼šnexuså¯†ç 

SOURCE_DIRï¼šæœ¬åœ°mavenä»“åº“è·¯å¾„

nexusé»˜è®¤æ˜¯ä¸å…è®¸è¦†ç›–ä¸Šä¼ éœ€è¦æ›´æ”¹é…ç½®æ‰è¿è¡Œè¦†ç›–ä¸Šä¼ 

import os
import threading
from pathlib import Path
from xml.etree import ElementTree as ET
import requests
from requests.auth import HTTPBasicAuth
from tqdm import tqdm
from queue import Queue

# ================= CONFIGURATION =================
REPO_URL = "http://127.0.0.1:8071/repository/maven-releases/"
USERNAME = "admin"
PASSWORD = "admin"
SOURCE_DIR = r"D:\work\MavenRepository\mavenRepository"
THREAD_COUNT = 10
# =================================================

class MavenUploader:
    def __init__(self, repo_url, username, password):
        self.repo_url = repo_url
        self.auth = HTTPBasicAuth(username, password)
        self.session = requests.Session()
        self.session.auth = self.auth
        
    def parse_pom(self, pom_path):
        """è§£æPOMæ–‡ä»¶è·å–GAVä¿¡æ¯"""
        try:
            tree = ET.parse(pom_path)
            root = tree.getroot()
            ns = {'m': 'http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0'}
            
            def get_text(xpath_with_ns, xpath_without_ns):
                elem = root.find(xpath_with_ns, ns)
                if elem is not None and elem.text:
                    return elem.text.strip()
                elem = root.find(xpath_without_ns)
                if elem is not None and elem.text:
                    return elem.text.strip()
                return None
            
            group_id = get_text('m:groupId', 'groupId')
            artifact_id = get_text('m:artifactId', 'artifactId')
            version = get_text('m:version', 'version')
            packaging = get_text('m:packaging', 'packaging') or 'jar'
            
            if not group_id:
                group_id = get_text('m:parent/m:groupId', 'parent/groupId')
            if not version:
                version = get_text('m:parent/m:version', 'parent/version')
            
            return group_id, artifact_id, version, packaging
        except Exception as e:
            return None, None, None, None
    
    def upload_file(self, file_path, group_id, artifact_id, version, filename):
        """ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°Nexus"""
        try:
            group_path = group_id.replace(".", "/")
            remote_path = f"{group_path}/{artifact_id}/{version}/{filename}"
            upload_url = f"{self.repo_url}{remote_path}"
            
            with open(file_path, 'rb') as f:
                response = self.session.put(upload_url, data=f, timeout=300)
            
            return response.status_code in [200, 201, 204]
        except Exception as e:
            return False
    
    def process_artifact(self, pom_path, pbar):
        """å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªMavenæ„ä»¶"""
        group_id, artifact_id, version, packaging = self.parse_pom(pom_path)
        
        if not all([group_id, artifact_id, version]):
            pbar.write(f"âš  Skip (Bad POM): {pom_path}")
            return False
        
        uploaded = []
        failed = []
        
        # 1. å§‹ç»ˆä¸Šä¼  POM
        pom_filename = os.path.basename(pom_path)
        if self.upload_file(pom_path, group_id, artifact_id, version, pom_filename):
            uploaded.append('pom')
        else:
            failed.append('pom')
        
        # 2. ä¸Šä¼ ä¸»æ„ä»¶ï¼ˆJAR/WAR/etcï¼‰
        base_path = pom_path.rsplit('.', 1)[0]
        main_artifact = f"{base_path}.{packaging}"
        
        if os.path.exists(main_artifact):
            main_filename = os.path.basename(main_artifact)
            if self.upload_file(main_artifact, group_id, artifact_id, version, main_filename):
                uploaded.append(packaging)
            else:
                failed.append(packaging)
        
        # 3. ä¸Šä¼ é™„åŠ æ–‡ä»¶
        for suffix in ['-sources.jar', '-javadoc.jar', '-tests.jar']:
            extra_file = base_path + suffix
            if os.path.exists(extra_file):
                extra_filename = os.path.basename(extra_file)
                if self.upload_file(extra_file, group_id, artifact_id, version, extra_filename):
                    uploaded.append(suffix.strip('-'))
                else:
                    failed.append(suffix.strip('-'))
        
        # è¾“å‡ºç»“æœ
        if uploaded:
            files_str = ', '.join(uploaded)
            pbar.write(f"âœ“ {group_id}:{artifact_id}:{version} [{files_str}]")
        
        if failed:
            files_str = ', '.join(failed)
            pbar.write(f"âœ— {group_id}:{artifact_id}:{version} FAILED: [{files_str}]")
        
        return len(failed) == 0

def worker(uploader, task_queue, pbar, stats):
    """å·¥ä½œçº¿ç¨‹"""
    while True:
        pom_path = task_queue.get()
        if pom_path is None:
            break
        
        try:
            success = uploader.process_artifact(pom_path, pbar)
            stats['success' if success else 'failed'] += 1
        except Exception as e:
            pbar.write(f"âœ— Error: {pom_path} - {str(e)}")
            stats['failed'] += 1
        finally:
            pbar.update(1)
            task_queue.task_done()

class ThreadSafeStats(dict):
    def __init__(self, *args, **kwargs):
        super().__init__(*args, **kwargs)
        self._lock = threading.Lock()
    
    def __setitem__(self, key, value):
        with self._lock:
            super().__setitem__(key, value)
    
    def __getitem__(self, key):
        with self._lock:
            return super().__getitem__(key)

def main():
    print(f"Scanning directory: {SOURCE_DIR} ...")
    
    # æŸ¥æ‰¾æ‰€æœ‰ POM æ–‡ä»¶
    all_poms = list(Path(SOURCE_DIR).rglob("*.pom"))
    
    # è¿‡æ»¤æ‰ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
    pom_files = [
        p for p in all_poms 
        if not any(x in str(p) for x in ['maven-metadata', 'resolver-status', '.lastUpdated'])
    ]
    
    total = len(pom_files)
    print(f"Found {total} POM files (filtered from {len(all_poms)} total)")
    
    if total == 0:
        print("No valid POM files found!")
        return
    
    uploader = MavenUploader(REPO_URL, USERNAME, PASSWORD)
    task_queue = Queue()
    stats = ThreadSafeStats({'success': 0, 'failed': 0})
    
    pbar = tqdm(total=total, desc="Uploading", unit="artifact")
    
    # å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹
    threads = []
    for _ in range(THREAD_COUNT):
        t = threading.Thread(target=worker, args=(uploader, task_queue, pbar, stats))
        t.daemon = True
        t.start()
        threads.append(t)
    
    # æ·»åŠ ä»»åŠ¡
    for pom in pom_files:
        task_queue.put(str(pom))
    
    # ç­‰å¾…å®Œæˆ
    task_queue.join()
    
    # ç»“æŸçº¿ç¨‹
    for _ in range(THREAD_COUNT):
        task_queue.put(None)
    for t in threads:
        t.join()
    
    pbar.close()
    
    print("\n" + "="*50)
    print(f"Upload Summary:")
    print(f"  Total Artifacts: {total}")
    print(f"  Success: {stats['success']}")
    print(f"  Failed: {stats['failed']}")
    print("="*50)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

import com.google.common.base.Converter;

public class ConverterExample {

        Converter<String, Integer> stringToIntegerConverter = new Converter<String, Integer>() {
            @Override
            protected Integer doForward(String s) {
                return Integer.valueOf(s);
            }

            @Override
            protected String doBackward(Integer integer) {
                return integer.toString();
            }
        };

        // ä½¿ç”¨è½¬æ¢å™¨è¿›è¡Œæ­£å‘è½¬æ¢
        String str = "1234";
        Integer intValue = stringToIntegerConverter.convert(str);
        System.out.println("String to Integer: " + intValue); // è¾“å‡º: 1234

        // ä½¿ç”¨è½¬æ¢å™¨è¿›è¡Œåå‘è½¬æ¢
        String reversedStr = stringToIntegerConverter.reverse().convert(intValue);
        System.out.println("Integer to String: " + reversedStr); // è¾“å‡º: 1234

        // åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå°å†™åˆ°å¤§å†™çš„è½¬æ¢å™¨
        Converter<String, String> lowerToUpperConverter = new Converter<String, String>() {
            @Override
            protected String doForward(String s) {
                return s.toUpperCase();
            }

            @Override
            protected String doBackward(String s) {
                return s.toLowerCase();
            }
        };

        // ç»„åˆè½¬æ¢å™¨ï¼šå…ˆå°†å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•´æ•°ï¼Œå†å°†æ•´æ•°è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå¤§å†™å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
        Converter<String, String> combinedConverter = stringToIntegerConverter.andThen(new Converter<Integer, String>() {
            @Override
            protected String doForward(Integer integer) {
                return "Number: " + integer;
            }

            @Override
            protected Integer doBackward(String s) {
                return Integer.valueOf(s.replace("Number: ", ""));
            }
        });

        // ä½¿ç”¨ç»„åˆè½¬æ¢å™¨è¿›è¡Œè½¬æ¢
        String combinedResult = combinedConverter.convert(str);
        System.out.println("Combined Converter Result: " + combinedResult); // è¾“å‡º: Number: 1234

        // ä½¿ç”¨ç»„åˆè½¬æ¢å™¨è¿›è¡Œåå‘è½¬æ¢
        String originalStr = combinedConverter.reverse().convert(combinedResult);
        System.out.println("Original String: " + originalStr); // è¾“å‡º: 1234
    }
}
